errors.error_description: Installing taipy-core package which is unnecessary since the repository is archived and the code has been moved to the main taipy repository
correction_candidates: Remove the taipy-core installation since this repository is archived
Install the main taipy package instead of taipy-core
Add more dependencies like numpy and matplotlib
Use pip install --upgrade to ensure latest versions
errors.golden_answer: Remove the taipy-core installation since this repository is archived
